definitions.definition: To utter a loud, sharp, shrill sound or cry, as do some birds and beasts; to scream , as in a sudden fright , in horror or anguish .
To utter sharply and shrilly; to utter in or with a shriek or shrieks.

main_definition: ( intransitive ) To utter a loud, sharp, shrill sound or cry, as do some birds and beasts; to scream , as in a sudden fright , in horror or anguish .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To utter sharply and shrilly; to utter in or with a shriek or shrieks.
